// Structure: Array
#pragma once
#include <array>
#include <cstdint>
#include <limits>
#include <string_view>

class ArrayStructure_SByte_5 final
{
    static constexpr std::array<int8_t, 5> entries = {
        std::numeric_limits<int8_t>::lowest(), -1, 0, 1, std::numeric_limits<int8_t>::max()
    };

public:
    [[nodiscard]]
    static bool contains(const int8_t value) noexcept
    {
        if (value < std::numeric_limits<int8_t>::lowest() || value > std::numeric_limits<int8_t>::max())
            return false;

        for (size_t i = 0; i < 5; i++)
        {
            if (entries[i] == value)
               return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    static constexpr size_t item_count = 5;
    static constexpr int8_t min_value = std::numeric_limits<int8_t>::lowest();
    static constexpr int8_t max_value = std::numeric_limits<int8_t>::max();

public:
    ArrayStructure_SByte_5() = delete;
    ArrayStructure_SByte_5(const ArrayStructure_SByte_5&) = delete;
    ArrayStructure_SByte_5& operator=(const ArrayStructure_SByte_5&) = delete;
    ArrayStructure_SByte_5(ArrayStructure_SByte_5&&) = delete;
    ArrayStructure_SByte_5& operator=(ArrayStructure_SByte_5&&) = delete;
};
